definition: to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: He presents his idea to the board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 他將自己的想法上報董事會。

sentences.english: Biden filed a separate non-resident tax return for the state of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 拜登博士還單獨上報了一份維珍尼亞州非居住居民稅。

sentences.english: We might even go over his head to appeal for what we think is right.
sentences.chinese: 我們甚至會越級上報，以爭取我們認爲對的事。

sentences.english: Ginkgo village "Tiankeng" after the incident, the villagers reported immediately to the township government.
sentences.chinese: 白果村“天坑”事件發生後，村民們立即上報鄉政府。

sentences.english: Yes. The current year of sales must be reported to IRD.
sentences.chinese: 的確，本年度的銷售額要上報給IRD。

sentences.english: Perfrom attendance checks and submit statistics reports.
sentences.chinese: 做好學習考勤和統計上報工作。

sentences.english: Rearrange the cost of pre-opening and hand it in.
sentences.chinese: 對整個籌開費用將重新整理上報。

sentences.english: Authorities requested that river traffic and others along the river alert them if they noticed any floating bodies.
sentences.chinese: 當局已經要求過往船隻發現漂浮的屍體後上報。

sentences.english: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report .
sentences.chinese: 每間艙房總有些小毛病或機件失靈的事故上報。

sentences.english: Some people have reported up to fifteen pounds of weight loss with just one 7 day colon cleanse.
sentences.chinese: 有些人已經上報至一十五英鎊減重只需七天結腸清洗。

sentences.english: Ginkgo village "tiankeng" after the incident the villagers reported immediately to the township government.
sentences.chinese: 白果村“天坑”事件發生後，村民們立即上報鄉政府。

sentences.english: So that when i iet photographed, your work ends up in "w"?
sentences.chinese: 到時我被拍照取材你的作品就會上報了？

sentences.english: Today’s news brought me at least two acquisition notices.
sentences.chinese: 今天新聞上報出了兩則有關收購的消息。

sentences.english: The Japanese are reported to kill four Baiyu Ren.
sentences.chinese: 這天都上報殺人數目，共四百餘人。

sentences.english: Any incident and near miss must be reported to LOP Control Center (CC1) immediately.
sentences.chinese: 任何事件和未遂事件都必須立即上報CC1。

sentences.english: Determine if and when the GM should be alerted.
sentences.chinese: 同時決定是否與何時上報給總經理。

definition: persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
